features.title: Features
features.angular-cli: A command line interface for Angular
features.rxjs: Reactive programming with async collections using Observables
features.material-icons: Latest icon fonts and CSS for self-hosting material design icons
features.ngrx: One way data flow powered by RxJS Observables
features.bootstrap: Responsive layout from battle tested, world most famous UI library
features.fontawesome: Easy to use vector icons and social logos
features.lazy-loading: Lazy loading helps keep initial bundle sizes smaller, which in turn helps decrease load times.
features.theming: Customize color and typography styles for components in your application
features.eslint: ESLint is for identifying problematic patterns found in JavaScript and Typescript code
features.typescript: Superior developer experience, code completion, refactoring and less bugs
